column2: "You are about to take part in a study in which you will see one of two stimuli: a red or blue circle seen below.  The circle will appear at a different left-right location
column3: but the location it appears in is irrelevant.  When you see the stimulus
column4: respond as quickly as possible: when you see a red circle
column5: press the left shift key; when you see the blue circle
column6: press the right shift key.  \n\nPractice now by hitting the shift keys to see which stimulus the map onto.  Hit the space key to begin."

column2: "Take a short break.  Press space bar to begin again"
Thank you for participating.  Press any key to continue.
